column4: hey all i'm sitting here with my new compaq and with ubuntu live cd
does anyone know whether ubuntu will void my HP warranty?
actually there are a lot of hp drivers
if hp calls them illegal, they will lose some share in the market
are you talking about a printer?
then i am not sure.. but hplip is hp developed
thanks but i don't have a hp printer :)
why dont you dualboot ur box?
i don't want to dual boot
then.. red hat and opensuse have hp support
